core_constraints.name: valid_move_prime_multiplication_or_division
core_constraints.description: Each move must select a number that is the current circled number multiplied or divided by a prime, and must remain in [1, n].

core_constraints.name: first_move_must_be_even
core_constraints.description: The first move must choose an even integer from [1, n].

core_constraints.name: numbers_in_range
core_constraints.description: All numbers involved must be integers between 1 and n inclusive.

objective.description: Decide whether the first player has a winning strategy; if so, output any winning first move (an even number).

invariant.name: game_state_as_number_with_prime_factor_moves
invariant.description: Game state is fully represented by the currently circled number; valid transitions correspond to multiplying/dividing by primes while staying in [1, n].
